getLocalAddress

public static java.net.InetAddress getLocalAddress()
                                            throws java.net.SocketException
Finds a local, non-loopback, IPv4 address

Returns:
The first non-loopback IPv4 address found, or null if no such addresses found
Throws:
java.net.SocketException - If there was a problem querying the network interfaces
